@graph.rdfs:comment: A competency framework entry in a Directory
@graph.rdfs:label: Asset Entry

@graph.rdfs:comment: Container for a requested a competency framework and associated metadata including the URI of the provider registry, transaction date/time stamp and URIs identifying controling use and retention policies for the transmitted competency framework.
@graph.rdfs:label: Asset Envelope

@graph.rdfs:comment: A word, name, acronym, phrase, etc. with a formal definition.
@graph.rdfs:label: Defined Term

@graph.rdfs:comment: A set of defined terms for example a set of categories or a classification scheme, a glossary, dictionary or enumeration.
@graph.rdfs:label: Defined Term Set

@graph.rdfs:comment: ODRL encoded License defining a Trust Member's required permissions and prohibitions regarding the use and retention of one of its competency frameworks by another Trust Member or an end user.
@graph.rdfs:label: Member Policy
@graph.skos:note: A competency framework always has two distinct member policies, one constraining the behavior of an end user (beneficiary rights) and another constraining the sharing of a competency framework by one Trust Member with another Trust Member (registry rights).

@graph.rdfs:comment: A structured table of contents of the competency framework holdings of a Trust Member registry.
@graph.rdfs:label: Member Directory of Assets

@graph.rdfs:comment: Directory of all the Trust Member registries.
@graph.rdfs:label: Directory of Registries

rdfs:comment.en-US: An immutable, searchable log of each Trust Network transaction transmitting a Framework Package from one Trust Member to another Trust Member.

@graph.rdfs:comment: A structured table of the aggregate contents of the competency framework holdings in the Trust Member registries.
@graph.rdfs:label: Trust Directory

@graph.rdfs:comment: Registry trust member in good standing.
@graph.rdfs:label: Trust Node Member

@graph.rdfs:comment: URL of an AssetEntry in a directory.
@graph.rdfs:label: Asset (Competency Framework)

@graph.rdfs:comment: Name of an organization or person to which credit is owed as copyright holder and/or author.
@graph.rdfs:label: Attribution Name

@graph.rdfs:comment: URL identifying an organization or person to which credit is owed as copyright holder and/or author.
@graph.rdfs:label: Attribution Name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Resource defining the permissions and prohibitions on end users of a Trust Member's competency frameworks.
@graph.rdfs:label: End User License

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date and time that the request was passed on by a request broker to the provider node agent.
@graph.rdfs:label: Broker Request Date

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date and time that a request broker returned the response to the requester.
@graph.rdfs:label: Broker Response Date

@graph.rdfs:comment: Statement of constraints on a person or application accessing the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Conditions of Access

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date on which the CreativeWork was created or the item was added to a DataFeed.
@graph.rdfs:label: Date Created

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified within a DataFeed.
@graph.rdfs:label: Date Modified

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date and time that the request was initiated by the requester.
@graph.rdfs:label: Date Requested

@graph.rdfs:comment: Statement of the exact meaning of a concept.
@graph.rdfs:label: Definition

@graph.rdfs:comment: A description of the item.
@graph.rdfs:label: Description

@graph.rdfs:comment: HTTP status code in the 4xx or 5xx range indicating that an error occurred in attempting to satisfy a request.
@graph.rdfs:label: Error Code

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date and time that an error was detected or reported.
@graph.rdfs:label: Error Date

@graph.rdfs:comment: Message that describes the nature of an error that occurred.
@graph.rdfs:label: Error Message

@graph.rdfs:comment: Trust Member registry transmitting a competency framework to a Trust Member registry requesting the framework.
@graph.rdfs:label: Framework Provider

@graph.rdfs:comment: Trust Member registry requesting transmission of a competency framework from another Trust Member registry.
@graph.rdfs:label: Framework Requestor

@graph.rdfs:comment: A Defined Term contained in this term set.
@graph.rdfs:label: Has Defined Term

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates an item or CreativeWork that is part of this item, or CreativeWork (in some sense).
@graph.rdfs:label: Has Part

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates an item or CreativeWork that this item, or CreativeWork (in some sense), is part of.
@graph.rdfs:label: Is Part Of

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the item.
@graph.rdfs:label: Name

@graph.rdfs:comment: One or more URIs identifying access control credentials used when accessing the native API of the competency framework registry.
@graph.rdfs:label: Native Access Control

@graph.rdfs:comment: A URI that identifies the protocol that the provider node agent uses to retrieve the asset from the competency framework registry.
@graph.rdfs:label: Native Protocol

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of occupation; select from an existing enumeration of such types.
@graph.dcterms:description: For U.S. credentials, best practice is to identify an occupation using a framework such as the O*Net. Other credentials may use any framework of the class ceterms:OccupationClassification, such as the EU's ESCO, ISCO-08, and SOC 2010.
@graph.rdfs:label: Occupation Type

@graph.rdfs:comment: Metamodel of the payload paired with this envelope.
@graph.rdfs:label: Payload Metamodel

@graph.rdfs:comment: Category of the payload as defined in a concept scheme.
@graph.dcterms:description: Presence of this attribute indicates that the envelope is paired with a competency framework payload.
@graph.rdfs:label: Payload Type

@graph.rdfs:comment: URL of the provider node agent.
@graph.rdfs:label: Provider Agent

@graph.rdfs:comment: Metamodel of the competency framework originally returned by the provider agent; ; e.g., ASN, IMS CASE v. 1.0.
@graph.rdfs:label: Provider Metamodel

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date and time that the provider network node agent responded to the request.
@graph.rdfs:label: Provider Response Date

@graph.rdfs:comment: Reqource identifying the publication status of the entity.
@graph.rdfs:label: Publication Status

@graph.rdfs:comment: Resource defining the permissions and prohibitions on a Trust Member's use and retention of another Trust Member's competency framework.
@graph.rdfs:label: Registry Rights

@graph.rdfs:comment: URL of the competency framework being requested.
@graph.rdfs:label: Requester Agent

@graph.rdfs:comment: URL of the requester node agent.
@graph.rdfs:label: Requester Agent

@graph.rdfs:comment: Metamodel preferred by the requester; e.g., ASN, IMS CASE v. 1.0.
@graph.rdfs:label: Requester Metamodel

@graph.rdfs:comment: A code that identifies this DefinedTerm within a DefinedTermSet
@graph.rdfs:label: Term Code

@graph.rdfs:comment: Name given to the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Title

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date/time of a transaction between two Trust Members transferring a competency framework.
@graph.rdfs:label: Transaction Date

@graph.rdfs:comment: URL of the item.
@graph.rdfs:label: URL
